body: Another classic from the greatest artist on this site.
The cum logic in this doujinshi. lOL

@Mikeachu Yeah, Chun is really big in the Ryona, rape, slave, rough sex, and shotacon world.

A strong women like Chun  being taken advantage is just really hot to a lot of people. But I do wish she had some nice vanilla romantic stuff.

YES! Excellent coloring, and an excellent choice on the series! I've seen lots of hentai doujin in my time, and Nori-Haru is the absolute best. The artwork on his Chun-Li series is second to none. The shading, the angles, the splatters of cum. It's perfect (even if it's rapey). I don't know who "Nobody" is, but I sure hope you get the time to colorize and decensor his other works, especially Reijoku. Good lord, that's the best facial Chun-Li has ever taken. A damn shame we can't find uncensored versions of his stuff, besides the Mai Shiranui series for some weird reason. Great work, Nobody....whoever you really are ;)
So much of her doujins are rape or futa (or both). Why isn't femdom or vanilla more common?
